title: Part One: Kellogg: The Great American Cum Doctor
itunes:title: Part One: Kellogg: The Great American Cum Doctor
description:
Robert is joined by Miles Gray to discuss John Harvey Kellogg.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://www.mcgill.ca/oss/article/health-nutrition-history-quackery/enigmatic-dr-kellogg 
  2. https://medium.com/@dannykane97/john-harvey-kellogg-and-his-anti-masturbation-cereals-832440cd0f5b 
  3. https://daily.jstor.org/the-strange-backstory-behind-your-breakfast-cereal/ 
  4. https://www.jstor.org/stable/pdf/3105184.pdf?refreqid=excelsior%3A7e6d7b4730a69e610ae5fd831f204fd8 
  5. https://theattic.jezebel.com/john-harvey-kelloggs-legacy-of-cereal-sociopathy-and-1777402050 
  6. https://www.history.com/news/dr-john-kellogg-cereal-wellness-wacky-sanitarium-treatments
  7. http://eugenicsarchive.ca/discover/connections/553e95f955b4ad0326000001
  8. https://www.battlecreekenquirer.com/story/news/2019/03/21/john-harvey-kellogg-battle-creek-michigan-eugenics-race-nazis/3202628002/ 
  9. https://www.npr.org/transcripts/542145177
  10. Wilson, Brian C.. Dr. John Harvey Kellogg and the Religion of Biologic Living (pp. xiii-xiv). Indiana University Press. Kindle Edition.
